meanings.definition: The state of being excessively fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: Her corpulency made it difficult for her to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his corpulency.
meanings.sent3: Despite her corpulency, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the corpulency of the heavy furniture.
meanings.sent5: The corpulency of the elephant was a sight to behold at the zoo.

meanings.sent1: The cat's corpulency was evident in its round belly.
meanings.sent2: He struggled with his corpulency after indulging in too many sweets.
meanings.sent3: The corpulency of the snowman made it difficult to move.
meanings.sent4: The corpulency of the clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The corpulency of the suitcase made it challenging to lift.
